verses.text: 問安奉 神旨意蒙召作基督耶穌使徒的保羅，和蘇提尼弟兄，

words.note: Implies acting on behalf of or under the authority of.
Often formatted as 　神 in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.
Often used in the plural (弟兄姐妹) for 'brothers and sisters' in a religious context.

verses.text: 寫信給在哥林多 神的教會，就是在基督耶穌裡已經被分別為聖，蒙召為聖徒的人，和所有在各地呼求我們主耶穌基督的名的人。基督是他們的主，也是我們的主。

words.note: Often formatted as 　神 in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.
Often used as a locative suffix.
Can mean 'master' in general, but here refers to God/Christ.

verses.text: 願恩惠平安從我們的父 神和主耶穌基督臨到你們。

words.note: Refers to God the Father in this context.
Often formatted as 　神 in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.

verses.text: 為信徒感謝 神我因著 神在基督耶穌裡賜給你們的恩典，常常為你們感謝我的 神，

words.note: Often formatted as 　神 in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.
Often formatted as 　神 in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.
Often used as a locative suffix.
Often implies a gift from a superior or divine being.
Often formatted as 　神 in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.

verses.text: 因為你們在他裡面凡事都富足，很有口才，知識豐富，
就如我們為基督所作的見證在你們中間得到堅立一樣，

words.note: Indicates the object or result of a verb.

verses.text: 以致你們在恩賜上一無所缺，殷切盼望著我們主耶穌基督的顯現；

words.definition: so that, with the result that

verses.text: 他也必堅定你們到底，使你們在我們主耶穌基督的日子無可指摘。

words.note: Indicates strong certainty or necessity.

verses.text: 神是信實的，他呼召了你們，是要你們與他的兒子我們主耶穌基督連合在一起。
基督是分開的嗎？弟兄們，我憑著我們主耶穌基督的名，勸你們大家要同心，在你們中間不要分黨，只要在同一的心思、同一的意念上團結起來。

words.definition: of one mind, united in heart
only need to, just need to

verses.text: 我的弟兄們，革來氏家裡的人向我提到你們，說你們中間有紛爭。

words.note: Refers to fellow believers in a church context.
Refers to internal conflicts or divisions.

verses.text: 我的意思就是，你們各人說，我是保羅派的，我是亞波羅派的，我是磯法派的，我是基督派的。

words.note: Transliteration of Greek 'Christos'.

verses.text: 基督是分開的嗎？保羅為你們釘了十字架嗎？你們受洗是歸入保羅的名下嗎？

words.note: Transliteration of Greek 'Christos'.
Lit. 'ten-character frame', referring to the shape of a cross.

words.definition: to be initiated into, to belong to

words.note: Refers to allegiance or ownership under a person's name.

verses.text: 我感謝 神，除了基利司布和該猶以外，我沒有給你們任何人施過洗，

words.note: The elevated space indicates reverence for God.

verses.text: 所以你們沒有人可以說是受洗歸入我名下的。

words.definition: into the name of, to belong to

words.note: Refers to allegiance or ownership under a person's name.

verses.text: 我也給司提反一家的人施過洗；此外，有沒有給別人施過洗，我就不記得了。

words.note: Combines 'to baptize' (施洗) with past tense particle (過).
Forms 'yes/no' question with '有...沒有'.
Combines 'to baptize' (施洗) with past tense particle (過).

verses.text: 基督差遣我，不是要我去施洗，而是去傳福音；不是靠著智慧的言論去傳，免得基督的十字架失去了效力。

words.definition: to want, to be going to

words.note: Lit. 'ten-character frame', referring to its shape.

verses.text: 基督是 神的能力和智慧因為十字架的道理，對走向滅亡的人來說是愚笨的，但對我們這些得救的人，卻是 神的大能。

words.note: Refers to the singular God; sometimes capitalized in Chinese Bibles.
Lit. 'ten-character frame', referring to its shape.
Refers to the singular God; sometimes capitalized in Chinese Bibles.

verses.text: 因為經上記著說：「我要滅絕智慧人的智慧，廢棄聰明人的聰明。」

words.note: Refers to what is written in the Bible.

verses.text: 智慧人在哪裡？經學家在哪裡？今世的辯士在哪裡？ 神不是使屬世的智慧變成了愚笨嗎？

words.note: Refers to Jewish scholars and teachers of the Law.
Refers to the singular God; sometimes capitalized in Chinese Bibles.

verses.text: 因為在 神的智慧裡，世人憑自己的智慧，既然不能認識 神， 神就樂意藉著所傳的愚笨的道理，去拯救那些信的人。

words.note: Indicates the following verb is passive or object-oriented.

verses.text: 猶太人要求神蹟，希臘人尋找智慧，
我們卻傳揚釘十字架的基督；在猶太人看來是絆腳石，在外族人看來是愚笨的，

words.note: Lit. 'ten-character frame', referring to the cross shape.

verses.text: 但對那些蒙召的人，不論是猶太人或希臘人，基督是 神的能力， 神的智慧。
因為 神的愚笨總比人智慧， 神的軟弱總比人剛強。
弟兄們，你們想想，你們這些蒙召的，按人（「人」或譯：「世上的標準」、「世界的標準」）來看有智慧的不多，有權勢的不多，出身尊貴的也不多。

words.note: Common address in biblical context.
Reduplicated verb for softer tone or brief action.
蒙召 means 'to receive a calling'.
Contextually refers to human perspective or standards.
Common phrase to introduce a perspective or viewpoint.

verses.text: 但是 神卻揀選了世上愚笨的，使那些有智慧的羞愧。他也揀選了世上軟弱的，使那些剛強的羞愧。

words.note: Refers to the Christian God.
Indicates a turn or contrast.

verses.text: 他也揀選了世上卑賤的和被人輕視的，以及算不得甚麼的，為了要廢棄那些自以為是的，

words.note: Implies 'not even worth counting/considering'.
Here, meaning 'anything important'.

words.definition: in order to, for the purpose of

words.note: An idiom meaning 'to think oneself always right'.

verses.text: 使所有的人在 神面前都不能自誇。

words.note: Refers to the Christian God.

verses.text: 你們因著 神得以在基督耶穌裡，他使基督成了我們的智慧；就是公義、聖潔和救贖，

words.note: Refers to the Christian God.

words.definition: be able to, so as to
words.note: Means 'to manage to do something'.

verses.text: 正如經上所說的：「誇口的應當靠著主誇口。」

words.note: Often introduces a comparison or explanation.
Refers to what is written 'on' or 'in' the sacred texts.
Precedes a verb to form a noun phrase, often implying passive voice.
Here, it nominalizes the preceding clause '經上所說' (that which is said in the Scripture).
A verb-object compound, lit. 'to make big talk with the mouth'.
Nominalizes the preceding verb '誇口', referring to 'the one who boasts'.

breakdown.m: to lean on, to rely on

words.note: The particle 著 indicates a continuous or sustained action.
A respectful title for God or Jesus Christ.
Repeated for emphasis in the quote.
